resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warlock's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save {@dc 15}), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dirt-Under-Nails is a 17th level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). He regains his expended spell slots when he finishes a short or long rest. He knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a {@dice d10} to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果泥土下的钉子与地面接触，在他的回合开始时可以恢复10点生命值。如果污垢-暗钉受到火灾伤害，这个特性在他的下一个回合开始时不会发挥作用。只有在他的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生的情况下，污垢-暗钉才会死亡。

trait.name: Shared Senses
entries: 泥土下的钉子可以看到和听到120英尺内任何植物所能看到和听到的东西。此外，泥土下的钉子可以与这个范围内的任何植物进行心灵感应。

trait.name: Special Equipment (+2 Rod of the Pact Keeper)
entries: While holding this {@item +2 Rod of the Pact Keeper||rod}, Dirt-Under-Nails gains a +2 bonus to spell attack rolls and to the saving throw DCs of his warlock spells (included in modifications, below). In addition, he can regain 1 warlock spell slot as an action while holding the rod. He can't use this property again until he finishes a long rest.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: 在它的每个回合中，污垢-Under-Nails可以使用10英尺的移动距离，神奇地踏入他周围5英尺内的一片蘑菇丛，并从它周围60英尺内的第二片蘑菇丛中走出来，出现在第二片蘑菇丛5英尺内的一个无人空间。两片蘑菇丛都必须是大型或更大。邋遢鬼不需要看到第二片蘑菇丛就可以使用这个能力。

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})重击伤害加上10 ({@damage 3d6})火焰伤害。

trait.name: Magic Club
entries: In the rotter's hand, its club is magical and deals 7 ({@damage 3d4}) extra damage (included in its attacks).

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The rotter has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 如果水獭与地面接触，在其回合开始时可重新获得10点生命值。如果水獭受到火灾伤害，该特性在水獭的下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。只有在它的回合开始时命中率为0并且没有再生的情况下，水獭才会死亡。

trait.name: Shared Senses
entries: 无赖可以看到和听到120英尺内任何植物所能看到和听到的东西。此外，无赖可以与这个范围内的任何植物进行心灵感应。

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: 在它的每个回合中，水獭可以使用10英尺的移动距离，神奇地踏入它周围5英尺内的一片蘑菇丛，并从它周围60英尺内的第二片蘑菇丛中走出来，出现在第二片蘑菇丛5英尺内的一个无人空间。两片蘑菇丛都必须是大型或更大。腐烂者不需要看到第二片灌木丛就可以使用这个能力。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 腐尸用它的棍棒进行两次攻击。

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4})重击伤害。
